thread.title: Lin-Manuel Miranda got his prom and Oscar tuxes at the same store | Page Six
thread.title_full: Lin-Manuel Miranda got his prom and Oscar tuxes at the same store | Page Six

author: Bryan Hood
title: Lin-Manuel Miranda got his prom and Oscar tuxes at the same store | Page Six
text:
Lin-Manuel Miranda knows who to turn to for his biggest nights, no matter what stage of his life he’s in.
“I got my tux at San Marko in Yonkers, New York, where I got my prom tux in 1998,” the “Hamilton” creator and star said on the Oscars red carpet on Sunday night.
Miranda, who’s up for Best Original Song for “How Far I’ll Go” from “Moana,” also brought along a date who knew him way back in high school in New York – his mother, Luz-Towns Miranda, who stunned in a black Escada evening gown with elbow-length gloves.
Both mother and son were among the numerous celebs sporting blue ribbons to show their support for the American Civil Liberties Union .
The two Mirandas seemed to be making the most of their big night: Lin-Manuel tweeted out that his mom was sneaking in some last-minute TV time on their way to the ceremony: “ nd my mom is watching Gilmore Girls on her phone on the way to the Oscars.”
